body: This is the initial release of `FoundationICU` for `FoundationPreview`. This version corresponds to `ICU 70.13` released under [this repository](https://github.com/apple-oss-distributions/ICU/commit/d9fe5a625f9d8f2c80814c5ae1b5ab544fdf7b92).
title: FoundationICU 0.0.1

body:
This release contains important fixes for building on iOS and Windows.

### Pull Requests
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/8 build: indicate that we are building ICU statically
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/9 build: bump C++ standard to C++14 on Windows
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/10 build: define `_CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE` on Windows
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/11 build: disable POSIX paths on Windows
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/12 build: define `U_ATTRIBUTE_DEPRECATED` when building
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/13 Fixed iOS build failures

### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 70.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.2

body:
This release fixed Linux build failures for `ICU 72.1`.

### Pull Requests
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/17 Fix Linux build failure


### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.4

body:
This release changed ICU data delivery method to embedded binary, as well as upgraded ICU to `72.1` (which aligns with the version shipped in macOS Sonoma).

### Pull Requests
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/14 Update SwiftFoundationICU to embed data files in the binary
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/16 Upgrade to ICU 72.1

### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.3

body:
This release contains a (temporary) fix for test failures on macOS, and a build fix for Windows.

---
### What's Changed
* Temporary fix: capture macros.unit to ensure we are using the right MeasureUnit is used with `initIsBaseUnit` by @iCharlesHu in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/19
* build: repair the build on Windows by @compnerd in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/20


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/compare/0.0.5...0.0.6

---
### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.6

body:
This release contains a (temporary) fix for build failures on macOS.

### Pull Requests
- https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/18 Renamed Point to work around the build failure

### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.5

body:
This release contains various fixes for Cmake support for Windows.

## What's Changed
* [CMake] Copy headers to known directory for direct client test builds by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/26
* [CMake] Remove direct link to stdc++ by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/27
* [CMake] Update defines to indicate combined, dynamic module build by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/28
* [CMake] Include GNUInstallDirs by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/29
* [CMake] Add small conveniences by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/30
* Use U_EXPORT instead of U_EXPORT2 for non-function symbol by @parkera in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/31

## New Contributors
* @jmschonfeld made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/26

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/compare/0.0.8...0.0.9


---
### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.9

body:
This release renamed the FoundationICU's module name to `_FoundationICU` in preparation for cmake support.

## What's Changed
* build: Repair the build on WASI by @kateinoigakukun in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/21
* Add library targets for the exported/import sub-modules of FoundationICU by @parkera in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/23
* Add underscore prefix to all modules in prepration for cmake support by @iCharlesHu in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/24

## New Contributors
* @kateinoigakukun made their first contribution in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/21

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/compare/0.0.6...0.0.7

---
### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.7

body:
This release:
- Introduced Cmake support.
- Combined all targets into one.
- Changed the `include` directory from `unicode` to `_foundation_unicode` to avoid conflicts with system ICU

## What's Changed
* Moved headers in ./unicode to ./include/unicode by @iCharlesHu in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/25
* Introduce CMake support for SwiftFoundationICU by @iCharlesHu in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/22


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/compare/0.0.7...0.0.8


---
### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 72.1`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.8

body:
This release upgrades ICU to `74.04` and contains a important bug fix that resolves sporadic test failures due to uninitialized memory.

## What's Changed
* Silence deprecation warnings by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/32
* [6.0] Add explicit modulemap path to take priority over modulemap from SDK by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/38
* [6.0] Ensure that SimpleDateFormat::fUsePlainSpaces is always initialized by @jmschonfeld in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/41
* [6.0] Upgrade to ICU 74 (#39) by @iCharlesHu in https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/pull/42


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/apple/swift-foundation-icu/compare/0.0.9...0.0.10

---
### Corresponding ICU Version: `ICU 74.0`
title: FoundationICU 0.0.10
